dialog.text: I can't believe you're making me do this.
You really are trying to kill me.
Prom is an important rite of passage. I don't want you to miss anything.
Shall we?
You're serious.
See? You're dancing.
At prom.
Edward... why did you save me? If you'd let the venom spread, I could've been like you by now.
You don't know what you're saying. You don't want this.
I want you. Always.
I won't end your life for you.
I'm dying anyway. Every minute, I get closer, older
That's how it's supposed to happen.
Not the way Alice saw it. I heard her. She saw me like you.
Her visions change, Bella.
Based on what someone decides. And I've decided.
Is that what you dream about? Becoming a monster?
I dream about being with you forever.
You really want this?
Yes.
You're ready right now?
Yes.
You're going to have a long and happy life with me. Isn't that enough?
For now.
